text:
the Alias /test/ don't works...
i added that in httpd.conf :
Alias /test/ "G:/test"

and when i go to http://darkmaxou.ftphost.net/test/ it works but when i want to
access to index.html, i get a 404 error...
creator: admin@darkmaxou.ftphost.net

text:
The slashes should be the same... i.e.

Alias /test "G:/test"

Does it work then?
creator: nd@perlig.de

text:
it don't work... i get the same 404 error when i click (in the listing) on
index.html
creator: admin@darkmaxou.ftphost.net

text: Ok, what, verbatim, does the error log say?
creator: nd@perlig.de

text:
i changed my config to :
Alias /test "G:/test/"
and now it works perfectly !
thanks André Malo
creator: admin@darkmaxou.ftphost.net
